text: Imagine both Dems win the Jan 5 runoff in Georgia because the Repubs self-suppress their vote with all the michegas about how Purdue and Loeffler don't deserve their votes because they're not giving it up for Herr Trump. The shock they feel when they realize the Dems now control both houses of Congress and the White House. The conspiracy theories. The sadness. Self-loathing.
